member.summary: The idle interval after which the subscription is automatically deleted.
member.remarks: The minimum duration is 5 minutes. Default value is .

member.name: P:FluentEvents.Azure.ServiceBus.Receiving.AzureTopicEventReceiverOptions.MaxConcurrentMessages

member.summary: A that returns unique names for subscriptions.

member.name: P:FluentEvents.Azure.ServiceBus.Receiving.AzureTopicEventReceiverOptions.SubscriptionName
